thread.title: Star Wars releases new trailer, 'The Force Awakens'
thread.title_full: Star Wars releases new trailer, 'The Force Awakens'

title: Star Wars releases new trailer, 'The Force Awakens'
text:
Posted: 10:23 p.m. Monday, Oct. 19, 2015 Star Wars releases new trailer, 'The Force Awakens' Star Wars: The Force Awakens ( Lucasfilm ) Related View Larger Joe Raedle MIAMI, FL - SEPTEMBER 04: Star Wars action figures are seen for sale at a Target store on September 4, 2015 in Miami, Florida. The merchandise is on sale ahead of the December release of the "Star Wars: The Force Awakens" movie. (Photo by Joe Raedle/Getty Images) More News Headlines Sponsored Links By Cox Media Group National Content Desk 
Star Wars has officially released the full trailer to its latest movie franchise installment, 'The Force Awakens.' 
The trailer was released during ESPN's Monday Night Football game between the New York Giants and the Philadelphia Eagles. 
Immediately after the release, fans were able to begin purchasing tickets to the movie that hits theaters Dec. 18. 
So many fans attempted to order the presale tickets that many sites such as Fandango and Movie Tickets crashed with the overwhelming response from excited movie-goers, prompting messages regarding "site maintenance." 
After debuting the full trailer, Star Wars released special edition avatars and emojis on Twitter.
